item.title: Setting up a Wireguard Server on Centos 7
item.description: Overview This guide will describe how to configure Wireguard on a Centos 7 server. The configuration will be targeted towards utilizing Wireguard as a VPN service. NOTE: This guide is not yet complete. I am going to add firewall configuration soon. Installing Wireguard Up-to-date installation instructions for Wireguard is available on the official WireGuard Installat Instructions Site Server Setup Make wireguard configuration As root: $ mkdir /etc/wireguard $ touch /etc/wireguard/wg0-vpn-server.
